bioconda.name: bioconductor-meshdbi
bioconda.summary: DBI to construct MeSH-related package from sqlite file

biotools.summary: The package is a unified implementation of MeSH.db, MeSH.AOR.db, and MeSH.PCR.db and also is interfaced to construct Gene-MeSH package (MeSH.XXX.eg.db). loadMeSHDbiPkg import sqlite file and generate MeSH.XXX.eg.db.

bioschemas.name: MeSHDbi
bioschemas.summary: The package is a unified implementation of MeSH.db, MeSH.AOR.db, and MeSH.PCR.db and also is interfaced to construct Gene-MeSH package (MeSH.XXX.eg.db). loadMeSHDbiPkg import sqlite file and generate MeSH.XXX.eg.db.
